extension.description: This add-on enables playing content from the CuriosityStream website. It requires the user to be subscribed to one of the CuriosityStream plans. It is not created, maintained or in any way affiliated with CuriosityStream. The add-on only provides an interface to access CuriosityStream media from Kodi.
